name: Gravity Royale
description:
Game created durind Slavic Game Jam 2018!

Survive as long as You can in this hostile environment! Don't touch red elements of the level, but try to force your opponent to do so. Gravity is changing every few seconds, so this is not going to be easy task.

Controls:

First player - WASD and C (dash)

Second player (blue) - IJKL and N (dash)
